_comment_printWidth: Wrap lines that exceed this length
_comment_tabWidth: Number of spaces per indentation level
_comment_useTabs: Use spaces instead of tabs for indentation
_comment_semi: Add semicolons at the end of statements
_comment_singleQuote: Use single quotes instead of double quotes
_comment_quoteProps: Only add quotes around object properties when necessary
_comment_trailingComma: Add trailing commas wherever possible (ES5: objects, arrays, etc.)
_comment_bracketSpacing: Print spaces between brackets in object literals
_comment_bracketSameLine: Put the `>` of a multi-line HTML element at the end of the last line
_comment_arrowParens: Always include parentheses around arrow function parameters
_comment_endOfLine: Use line feed only (\n) for line endings
_comment_embeddedLanguageFormatting: Format embedded code (like CSS in JS)
_comment_singleAttributePerLine: Enforce single attribute per line in HTML/JSX when multiline
